g.text: request data (citizenID, nhsID, birthDate, sex, TIN, phoneNumber, email, name)
registerClient(citizenID, nhsID, birthDate, sex, TIN, phoneNumber, email, name)
cl = registerClient(citizenID, nhsID, birthDate, sex, TIN, phoneNumber, email, name)
registerClient(citizenID, nhsID, birthDate, sex, TIN, phoneNumber, email, name)
register(citizenID, nhsID, birthDate, sex, TIN, phoneNumber, email, name)
shows the data and requests a confirmation
